availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Lucy Nall in 1834. Father of James W. Sullivan, John K. Sullivan, Jane Sullivan, Isaac Sullivan, and Robert N. Sullivan. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Married to Elizabeth Godman on July 19, 1865.

ab.bibl: Yates Publishing, U.S. and International Marriage Records, 1560-1900, Ancestry, source no. 4994.000. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 247. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 668. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Muhlenberg County Marriages, 1865. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, South Carrollton, p. 420. Otto A. Rothert, A History of Muhlenberg County (Louisville, KY: John P. Morton and Company, 1913), 277-278. “Raleigh Sullivan,” Find A Grave, "Raleigh Sullivan (March 10, 1810-October 4, 1878)" Memorial #85768129, http://findagrave.com/memorial/85768129 (accessed February 7, 2018).
